keyEvents.title: First Mention of Baltigo
keyEvents.description: Dragon mentions Baltigo as his destination, revealing it as the Revolutionary Army's headquarters.
keyEvents.significance: First introduction of the Revolutionary Army's base location.

description: The headquarters of the Revolutionary Army, mentioned by Dragon as his destination after attracting too much attention in the East Blue.

keyEvents.title: Ace's Departure
keyEvents.description: Ace departs from Goa Kingdom after seven years of training to begin his journey as a pirate.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of Ace's time in his homeland and the beginning of his pirate career.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Departure
keyEvents.description: Three years after Ace, Luffy departs from Goa Kingdom to begin his journey to the Grand Line.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of Luffy's adventure that leads to Episode 1.

description: The kingdom in East Blue where Luffy and Ace were raised. Both brothers depart from here to begin their pirate journeys.

keyEvents.title: Ace and Luffy's Training
keyEvents.description: Ace and Luffy continue their intensive training in the forest after Sabo's death.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the brothers grew stronger together over many years.

keyEvents.title: Bear Attack Incident
keyEvents.description: Ace saves Luffy from a bear attack during their training.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangers of their training and Ace's protective nature.

description: The mountain where Dadan's hideout is located and where Luffy and Ace trained together.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Bids Farewell
keyEvents.description: Luffy says goodbye to Makino, the Mayor, and the villagers before departing on his journey.
keyEvents.significance: Luffy's final moments in his home village before becoming a pirate.

description: The village in Goa Kingdom where Luffy grew up and where he departs from to begin his pirate journey.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Grief
keyEvents.description: In the present timeline, Luffy expresses his grief and self-doubt to Jinbe on Amazon Lily.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Luffy processes his grief over Ace's death.

description: The island in the Calm Belt where Luffy recovers after the events at Marineford.

keyEvents.title: Dadan Learns of Ace's Departure
keyEvents.description: Dadan's bandits inform her that Ace has left and relay his message of thanks.
keyEvents.significance: The moment Dadan realizes Ace has left and breaks down emotionally.

description: The mountain bandit hideout on Mt. Colubo where Dadan raised Luffy and Ace.

keyEvents.title: Dragon Returns with Rescued Person
keyEvents.description: Dragon returns to the Revolutionary Army ship carrying someone who needs urgent medical attention.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Sabo is brought after being rescued by Dragon.

description: The ship used by Dragon and the Revolutionary Army in the East Blue.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Defeats Lord of the Coast
keyEvents.description: Shortly after departing from Windmill Village, Luffy encounters and defeats the Lord of the Coast.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's growth and marks the beginning of his journey.

description: The sea where Luffy begins his journey, defeating the Sea King that took Shanks' arm.
